title: ADC / Mid Laner LF Duo

embed.description: Salrith / Silver 3 46LP / 24W 23L Win Ratio 51% / Jhin - 7W 3L Win Ratio 70%, Jinx - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Thresh - 2W 4L Win Ratio 33%, Kassadin - 2W 2L Win Ratio 50%, Twitch - 1W 2L Win Ratio 33%

body:
Hi all,

I'm looking for someone to play with me in Pre-Season into Season 8, I'm currently Silver 3, and looking at seriously mostly focusing on learning ADC.

Current Top played champions: Lucian / Twitch / Trist / Jhin / Varus & Sivir.

I mostly find myself using discord, and looking to improve myself as a player.

No toxic people.

Personal Preference Note: If anyone reading this is a coach, I'd happily pay for some services, to improve my skill in the role as adc.

Thanks!

Salrith  

(OCE Only)
